name: Crazy Traffic Control
description:
Can YOU save travelling cars from accidents? Can YOU take the role of a traffic controller and manipulate traffic lights to keep the roads safe?

Tap & change lights - you’re the one responsible now!

Keep cars from crashing into each other

Discover crazier and crazier intersections witch each level

Unlock new car types, intersections, trains, etc.

It’s time to find out! Imagine if traffic lights weren’t controlled automatically and someone had to manipulate them in real time to keep everyone from crashing into each other! What a job would that be!

Crazy Traffic Controller is a unique mix of fast-paced action game and a puzzle game, in which you have to be observant and ready to anticipate the upcoming challenges.
